service.name: react-component-library
service.description: AI-powered React component library with accessibility testing, performance benchmarking, and live component playground

api.description: Component library API port for component CRUD and testing

ui.description: Component showcase and playground UI port

health.description: React Component Library health check configuration

steps.name: verify-structure
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ“ Verifying React Component Library structure...' && ls -la

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building Go API...' && go mod download && go build -o react-component-library-api .
steps.description: Build Go API server for component management

steps.name: install-ui-deps
steps.run: cd ui && echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing UI dependencies with pnpm...' && pnpm install --filter .

steps.name: build-ui
steps.run: cd ui && echo 'âš›ï¸ Building React UI...' && npm run build

steps.name: setup-database
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ—ƒï¸ Setting up PostgreSQL schema...' && resource-postgres content execute "$(cat initialization/storage/postgres/schema.sql)"
steps.description: Initialize PostgreSQL schema for component storage

steps.name: setup-n8n-workflows
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ”„ Registering n8n workflows...' && ls initialization/automation/n8n/
steps.description: Verify n8n workflow files are present

steps.name: verify-resources
steps.run: echo 'âœ… Verifying resource connections...' && resource-postgres status && resource-qdrant status && resource-minio status
steps.description: Verify all required resources are accessible

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo 'ðŸš€ React Component Library setup complete!' && echo '  ðŸ“š Component Library: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}' && echo '  ðŸ”Œ API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}' && echo '  ðŸ’» CLI: react-component-library --help'

develop.description: Start React Component Library with production UI bundle

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && echo 'âš›ï¸ Starting React UI server...' && API_URL=http://localhost:${API_PORT} node scripts/update-health.js && node server.js
steps.description: Start Express server with built React app

shutdown.description: Gracefully stop React Component Library services

steps.name: stop-services
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ›‘ Stopping React Component Library services...' && pkill -f react-component-library-api || true && pkill -f 'npm start' || true && pkill -f 'serve.*build' || true

steps.name: cleanup-temp
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaning up temporary files...' && rm -rf /tmp/component-* 2>/dev/null || true

stop.description: Force stop React Component Library services

steps.name: stop-ui
steps.run: pkill -f "scenarios/react-component-library.*server\.js" || true; pkill -f "scenarios/react-component-library.*serve" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "scenarios/react-component-library" 2>/dev/null || true

postgres.description: Component metadata, versions, test results, and usage analytics storage

qdrant.description: Semantic search for component patterns, documentation, and code similarity

claude-code.description: AI-powered component generation, improvement suggestions, and code analysis

minio.description: Storage for component screenshots, exported packages, and static assets

redis.description: Caching for component metadata and search results (performance optimization)

browserless.description: Automated screenshot generation for visual regression testing
